text: Then He will answer them saying, ‘Assuredly I say to you, inasmuch as you did not do it to one of the least of these,“These” presumably refers to those on His right, the righteous. The wicked will be judged for how they treated the righteous (among other things). neither did you do it to me.’These people are basically selfish and self-centered, and self-centeredness is the essence of sin. That is why Lucifer rebelled against God, etc.
